mapper.select: SELECT A.BOM_DETAIL_ID AS bomDetailId,A.PARAM AS param,A.MATERIEL_CODE AS materielCode,B.MATERIEL_NAME AS materielName,B.TYPE AS type,A.USE_COUNT AS useCount,B.UNIT AS unit,A.CREATE_TIME as createTime,A.REMARK AS remark FROM ERP_BOM_DETAIL A LEFT JOIN ERP_MATERIEL B ON A.MATERIEL_CODE=B.MATERIEL_CODE AND A.ORG_ID=B.ORG_ID WHERE A.BOM_ID=#{bomId} AND A.MATERIEL_CODE LIKE #{materielCode} AND A.ORG_ID=#{orgId} AND (A.CHILD_BOM_ID IS NULL OR A.CHILD_BOM_ID='')
SELECT COUNT(1) AS ZS FROM ERP_BOM_DETAIL WHERE BOM_ID=#{bomId} AND MATERIEL_CODE=#{materielCode} AND ORG_ID=#{orgId}
SELECT COUNT(1) AS ZS FROM ERP_BOM_DETAIL WHERE BOM_ID=#{bomId} AND CHILD_BOM_ID=#{childBomId} AND ORG_ID=#{orgId}

(SELECT C.ID AS ID, C.CHILD_BOM_ID AS flagId, D.BOM_NAME AS name, C.USE_COUNT AS useCount, '' AS unit, '' AS price, 'b' AS type, C.REMARK AS remark FROM erp_bom_detail C JOIN erp_bom D ON C.CHILD_BOM_ID = D.BOM_ID WHERE C.BOM_ID = #{bomId} AND C.ORG_ID=#{orgId}) UNION (SELECT A.ID AS id, A.MATERIEL_CODE AS flagId, B.MATERIEL_NAME AS name, A.USE_COUNT AS useCont, B.UNIT AS unit, B.PRICE AS price, B.TYPE AS type, A.REMARK AS remark FROM erp_bom_detail A JOIN erp_materiel B ON A.MATERIEL_CODE = B.MATERIEL_CODE WHERE A.BOM_ID = #{bomId} AND A.ORG_ID=#{orgId})
